snippet: An article raises the issue of whether the Sierra Club's support of natural gas as a "bridge fuel" was influenced by donations from the gas industry.
abstract: An article raises the issue of whether the Sierra Club's support of natural gas as a "bridge fuel" was influenced by donations from the gas industry.
lead_paragraph: Time magazine reports that the Sierra Club accepted over $25 million in donations from the gas industry from 2007 to 2010, mostly from Chesapeake Energy's chief executive. The article raises the issue of whether the Sierra Club's support of natural gas as a "bridge fuel" was influenced by the donations.

headline.main: Report: Sierra Club Accepted Gas Industry Money
